TableField.name: RiskIndexID
TableField.phrase: Risk Index ID|An automatically assigned number used to track risk indices

TableField.name: IndexValue
TableField.phrase: Lower Value|The lowest product of the risk likelihood and risk severity which will result in the associated risk recommendation

TableField.name: RiskRecommendation
TableField.phrase: Risk Recommendation|A detailed phrase used to communicate a risk abatement or mitigation recommendation
TableField.sample: Take action if and when practical

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: RiskIndex
CombinedField.phrase: Risk Index|A combined field used to describe the risk index when associating it with other records

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about risk indices

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about a risk index

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
